column5: nice pictures and great looking fish. Great day for fishing, glad you got out and enjoyed it. Keep up the great fishing.

Well, after a loooong preparation the boat was on the water today at 2pm and did perform great. What a nice machine I've got, waooo... LOVE IT!!! All components and aftermarket equipment worked great, motors were solid. Got 55Mph top speed, plained in about 3 seconds And the kicker didn't burn any gas for the few hours of trolling. Steering arm, fuel filter, all worked fine.  And guess what...I even got some fish ha ha ha... The nice King was so impatient it didn't wait for me to put the rod in the rod holder after releasing my lead core and bammm fish on.... Later on the laker got hooked on the same rod/lure... Here are few pictures of the action today:  14 Lbs King.     11 Lbs Laker   Cheers, Ice Fisherman
That's the way to start out Emil !
sweet...
What's the name of the lure in the first picture that you caught the salmon on.  looks interesting.  nice fish, im jealous.  heading up to gbay this weekend trolling for bows in shallow.  cheers
Just bought it today and used it for the first time. Both fish got caught on it. Well spent $11,99 + tax  Cheers, Ice Fisherman
Nicely done Emil - glad to see your enjoying your new toy!  Don

Wow, Emil.  A plan comes together, a beautiful thing.  Congratulations!.  That boat is a beauty.  Hope to buy you some gas on a big lake sometime soon.  1 week on Opeongo in 2 weeks, me.  Hope that plan comes together too.

Thanks Doug. Lake O. - any time you are ready Bud. Just as I told you before.  Algonquin - well you'll be there few months ahead of me. Please tell those lakers there to get bigger fast as I'll be coming to see them again in August Have a good time on in the park Doug. Love that Opeongo fishing/camping!  Cheers, Ice Fisherman
congrats on the day
Nice fish man, and congrat's on the boat  .
Well done Emil!! Nice weather, nice boat, nice fish. The only thing missing is ME!! -Brian
Nice Emil... what a great start to the season....  Glad all worked out with the boat... WTG
What a great opener for you out on the big lake.  The boat performed well and you got some REAL nice fish!  Congrats on a great day!
I really need to get back out to Lake Ontario for some trolling.
Very nice!
Get your hands away from those gills Emil!
nice ones watch those fish lungs tho lo
Doesn't hurt them at all.. before they hit the grill ...
Opeongo in 2 weeks douG?  I dunno.  We don't have anything opening up here yet.  Gonna bring an auger?
Great fish  Now I really need to get out  Al SpoonMaster lures
Wooohooooo this is what I have been waiting for!!! awesome report Emil! Nice to see that boat functioning as it should!  Man am i jealous..  G

Wow! Nice fish. Tomorrow will be day 3 for me on Lake O and only 2 small browns so far. Today was way too windy. The offer is still open to anyone that wants to join. Launching in Burlington around 9 or 10. I'll check tomorrow morning for any takers.
Great job Emil! Boat looks great and your smile does as well! HH
WTG Emil, that smile definitely says it all.  So what was the name of the lure?  Stan
Hey Emil good to see you enjoying the new Boat can't wait to see the summer report with you and your boys. Nice fish!!!!  Sweet lookin ride Bud
